scripts.deploy: dotenv -e .env.deploy.local -- sh -c "vercel pull --yes --environment=production --scope $VERCEL_SCOPE --token $VERCEL_TOKEN && vercel build --scope $VERCEL_SCOPE --token $VERCEL_TOKEN && vercel deploy --prebuilt --prod --scope $VERCEL_SCOPE --token $VERCEL_TOKEN"
scripts.deploy:preview: dotenv -e .env.deploy.local -- sh -c "vercel pull --yes --environment=preview --scope $VERCEL_SCOPE --token $VERCEL_TOKEN && vercel build --scope $VERCEL_SCOPE --token $VERCEL_TOKEN && vercel deploy --prebuilt --scope $VERCEL_SCOPE --token $VERCEL_TOKEN"
